des: "Apples, maple syrup and cinnamon are microwaved, then pureed, for quick and easy apple butter that's great on any fresh baked good, or sandwich."
ins: In a microwave safe bowl, combine apples, maple syrup and cinnamon.  Microwave on high for 15 minutes.  Transfer mixture to a blender and process until smooth.  Return mixture to bowl and microwave 5 minutes more.  Cool and transfer to a jar.  Store in refrigerator.
